Umut (Hope) 1970 Yilmaz Guney

One the classics of Turkish cinema.
Umut has a reputation for being the archetype of the revolutionist and neo-realismo cinema stream in Turkey.
Obvious comparisons are with Ladri di Biciclette (The Bicycle Thief) though
this might be pushing it a bit. It is however still a very good film.

The story is centres on Cabbar horse-cab driver with a large family, growing
debts and a loterey ticket habit to support. Already barely getting by, his life begins to uterly collapse after one of his horses is killed by a car.

With-out enough money to both cover his debts and buy a new horse Cabbar is increasingly tempted by the treasure-hunting plans of his rougish best friend.

An English .srt subtitle file is included.
